attributes.action: Stop spam emails phone calls and letters
attributes.additional_details: I’m fed up with vulnerable people getting rip off through scam emails phone calls and letters
attributes.background: To make it a fine or prison term for taking money off vulnerable people

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban cold calling: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580055

Make unsolicited postal marketing illegal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573222
